= FSNET =

= Needs =

===In order to use FSNET, you will have to install :===
 * A java 6 compliant JVM
 * a servlet container (like Apache Tomcat)
 * a MySQL Database administration tool (like phpmyadmin)

You can find dependency librairies in fsnet-libs_d3.zip

= How to install FSNET =

 ===Theses explanations are for apache tomcat 6.x users :===

 # Download fsnet_d3.zip, fsnet-libs_d3.zip and fsnet-tray_d3.zip
 # Create a new user for mysql : username : *fsnet*, password : *fsnet*
 # Create a new database named *fsnet*
 # Unzip the fsnet-libs_d3.zip archive
 # Copy these dependencies in the tomcat/lib/ directory
 # unzip the fsnet_d3.zip
 # Copy the admin.war, fsnetWeb.war and webservice.war files in the tomcat/webapps
 # In tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml,add :
    <role rolename="fsnetadmin"/>
    <user username="admin" password="admin" roles="fsnetadmin"/>
 # Run Tomcat
 # Run the project in your web browser :
       * http://localhost:8080/admin for the administrator (with login & password)
       * http://localhost:8080/fsnetWeb for users
       * http://localhost:8080/webservice for the webservice used by tray
 # Unzip fsnet-tray_d3.zip
 # Run it using : java -jar trayDesktop.jar

= How to use FSNET =
After you have installed FSNET, you have to join the admin part.
At this time you should configure the SMTP server access because when you add
a new user, a password is generated and sent in the confirmation email.

For example to configure SMTP server using a gmail account :
 * SMTP Server : mail.gmail.com
 * Port : 465
 * Sender : yourname@gmail.com
 * Enable TLS : checked
 * Enable SSL : checked
 * Enable authentication : checked
 * Username : yourname
 * Password : ...
 * Fsnet address : the address of fsnet's public part that will be sent in the confirmation mail


= How to build from sources =
 # Checkout the last revision of fsnet using : svn checkout http://fsnet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ fsnet-read-only
 # cd fsnet-read-only/fr.univartois.ili.fsnet/
 # mvn package
 # wait for a while
 # you can take deliverables in : 
   * admin/target/admin-0.1.war 
   * fsnetWeb/target/fsnetWeb-0.1.war
   * webservice/target/webservice-0.1.war
   * trayDesktop/target/trayDesktop-0.1.jar
